Html:
All greetings!

I have a problem. It can already rose here, but it is very difficult to me to use yours a site as wash knowledge of English language are limited (even this text I write by means of the translator).

Purely problem:
I have a file in a format of Excel 97-2003. Except the common information it contains CorelBarCode object (the bar code generator).

I read a file a method

$objPHPExcel = PHPExcel_IOFactory:: load ("Excel.xls");

I add the data.

I save a method

$objWriter = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 ($objPHPExcel);
$objWriter-> save (' res.xls ');

Result:

The added data is.
CorelBarCode" object is not present.

Prompt how to troubleshoot?

Used PHPExcel_1.7.3c

Files:
The initial - russianguy_excel.xls
Result - russianguy_res.xls

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10749
